changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Add comprehensive fields for tenant management including contact info, billing, subscription plans, contracts, and terms acceptance. This supports the full lifecycle of sports facility organizations.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create sport_facilities table to represent sports clubs/facilities that belong to tenants. Each tenant can have multiple sport facilities (clubs), and each facility can have multiple branches.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create facility_branches table to represent physical locations/branches of sport facilities. Each sport facility can have multiple branches (locations).

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create facility_employee_groups table for managing groups of facility employees with shared permissions. Groups are scoped to a specific facility for multi-tenancy.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create facility_employee_group_permissions table to store permissions for facility employee groups. This is an ElementCollection table.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create facility_employees table for employees who work at sport facilities. Examples: receptionist, coach, manager, cleaning staff, maintenance worker.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create facility_employee_group_members junction table for many-to-many relationship between facility employees and their groups.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create facility_employee_branches junction table to support branch-level employee assignments. Employees can be assigned to specific branches within their facility. If no assignments exist, the employee has access to all branches.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create members table for facility customers who can book and purchase memberships.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create membership_plans table for branch-level membership offerings.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create memberships table linking members to membership plans with dates and payment info.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Add branch_id column to members table and update unique constraints to support branch-level member scoping. Members are now unique per branch instead of per facility.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create courts table for bookable resources (tennis courts, padel courts, etc.)

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create bookings table for court reservations/bookings

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Add court_booking_discount field to membership_plans table to enable percentage discounts on court bookings

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create payment_transactions table for tracking all payment operations across different gateways. Supports multiple payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, etc.) with gateway-agnostic tracking. Includes full audit trail, refund tracking, and multi-tenancy support.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Add authentication fields to members table for customer self-service authentication. Includes password hash, email verification, password reset, and account security fields.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create comprehensive notification system with multi-channel delivery, template management, user preferences, and delivery tracking.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create reports table for scheduled and ad-hoc analytics reporting. Supports multiple report types, scheduling, and various output formats.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create API keys table for Public API v1 authentication. Enables external integrations to access platform functionality securely.

changeSet.author: liyaqa
changeSet.comment: Create trainer booking system tables for personal training sessions. Enables members to book one-on-one or group sessions with trainers.
